Home intro: English School is dedicated to providing quality education in a friendly, supportive environment. We offer a range of programs designed to help students develop their language skills and prepare for academic success.
About.Second language: Learn English as a second language
About.Second language desc: With professional teachers, flexible learning schedules and courses for all levels, our live, online classes will have you speaking confidently in no time.
Why we?: Why learn English online with English School?
About. 2 layer. Card 1. Text: Build your confidence and learn to express yourself easily through conversation, light debate and role-playing.
About. 2 layer. Card 2. Text: Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.
About. 2 layer. Card 3. Text: You’ll be surrounded by the language and encouraged to speak in classes that have a maximum of only 5 students.
About. 3 layer. Text 1: We don’t simply teach English from a textbook.
About. 3 layer. Text 2: Through our rotation of international teachers, you’ll be exposed to a wide variety of accents, expressions and cultures. This means you’ll always learn the most up-to-date words and phrases used by English speakers worldwide.
About. 3 layer. Text 3: And, in our Business English classes, we’ll prepare you for success in all contexts, teaching you to communicate, present and negotiate with confidence.
About. 4 layer. Text 1: Each course is divided into specific learning levels. We teach up to C1 in English and B2 in Business English.
About. 5 layer. Title: Meet some of our English language teachers
About. 5 layer. Text: Our teachers come from all over the world, bringing a range of cultures, accents and experiences for you to learn from.
